channel.title: Learing Visual C++ (Beginners)
channel.description:
Hi i have visual C++, its a good program.Visual C++ is a fast program with many options. Do you that Windows and Linux is build in Visual C++. If you want to download Visual C++ so go to http://msdn.microsoft.com/vstudio/express/visualc/default.aspx :D
Download Teach yourself C++ in 21 days ebook http://rapidshare.de/files/30482147/Teach_yourself_C___in_21_days_.zip.html :D
Visual C++ is the fastest Program maker in the world and is not the easyest to!
send in a video about how you programing in Visual C++ and send it in here! :)
But i have Visual Studio 2005 pro some cosat money but i downloaded that in http://isohunt.com :D
[br][size=1]Posted at: August 23, 2006, 01:46:26 PM[/size][hr]http://rapidshare.de/files/30495586/hello_world_cpp_in_C__.avi.html to make a hello world cpp program :D
